sentences.english: The swarm dilating round the perfect trees.
sentences.chinese: 当蜂群围绕着完美的树聚集，膨胀。

sentences.english: The colony whines in a centerless loud drone that vibrates the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 蜂群嗡嗡喧闹的哀鸣振动邻里。

sentences.english: Used Equipment absorbs the smell of it's previous tenants therefore making an all natural attractant.
sentences.chinese: 旧蜂箱吸收了以前蜂群的气味从而具有天然的吸引力。

sentences.english: It is inefficient to target infantry one at a time with buzzers .
sentences.chinese: 让蜂群一次攻击一个步兵的做法是效率很低的。

sentences.english: Buzzers have the ability to clear garrisoned structures.
sentences.chinese: 蜂群拥有清除驻军建筑得能力。

sentences.english: In addition to clearing structures Buzzers can also garrison them.
sentences.chinese: 此外，蜂群清除建筑物后可以驻守在里面。

sentences.english: Buzzers are one of the most useful, versatile units the Scrin have at their disposal.
sentences.chinese: 蜂群是Scrin能够支配的最有效的通用单位。

sentences.english: He trotted in sync across the yard as the swarm eased away.
sentences.chinese: 他小跑着与蜂群同步穿过了院子。

sentences.english: Colonies that were once thriving suddenly went still, almost overnight.
sentences.chinese: 一度繁盛的蜂群几乎在一夜之间突然消失殆尽。

sentences.english: The study suggests this practice could lead to colony collapse.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明这一实践可能会导致蜂群毁灭。
养蜂人把蜂群装入蜂箱。

sentences.english: The management technique of swarm is in accordance with the production conditions that the queen bee pedestal syrup should have.
sentences.chinese: 蜂群管理技术要适应生产蜂王台浆所具备的条件。

sentences.english: The octahedral formations drifted apart and the drones spread out in the upper atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 八面体组合开始分离，蜂群一样飞出上层大气。

sentences.english: Moving buzzers completely devastate the infantry they go through.
sentences.chinese: 移动中得蜂群可以完全摧毁祂们途经得步兵。

sentences.english: The swarm-bearing man glided down a hill into a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 这位载着蜂群的男人滑下山岗，滑进一片沼泽。

sentences.english: Swarm Traps used in an Apiary will not cause managed colonies to swarm.
sentences.chinese: 放在蜂场附近的诱捕箱不会导致蜂群分蜂。
